name: Create ActiveEnergyLog tbl
Overwrite data after a month
Insert/Overwrite data
Calculate Energy Bills
Extract bills
func:
msg.topic = `
WITH latest_data AS (
    SELECT timestamp, ActiveEnergy 
    FROM ActiveEnergyLog 
    ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
    LIMIT 1
),
hourly_data AS (
    SELECT ActiveEnergy 
    FROM ActiveEnergyLog 
    WHERE timestamp <= (SELECT timestamp FROM latest_data) - 300
    ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
    LIMIT 1
),
daily_data AS (
    SELECT ActiveEnergy 
    FROM ActiveEnergyLog 
    WHERE timestamp <= (SELECT timestamp FROM latest_data) - 900
    ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
    LIMIT 1
),
weekly_data AS (
    SELECT ActiveEnergy 
    FROM ActiveEnergyLog 
    WHERE timestamp <= (SELECT timestamp FROM latest_data) - 1800
    ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
    LIMIT 1
),
monthly_data AS (
    SELECT ActiveEnergy 
    FROM ActiveEnergyLog 
    WHERE timestamp <= (SELECT timestamp FROM latest_data) - 3600
    ORDER BY timestamp DESC 
    LIMIT 1
),
baseline AS (
    SELECT ActiveEnergy 
    FROM ActiveEnergyLog 
    ORDER BY timestamp ASC 
    LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
    (SELECT timestamp FROM latest_data) AS latest_ts,
    (SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM latest_data) AS latest_energy,
    COALESCE((SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM hourly_data), (SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM baseline)) AS last_hourly_energy,
    COALESCE((SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM daily_data), (SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM baseline)) AS last_daily_energy,
    COALESCE((SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM weekly_data), (SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM baseline)) AS last_weekly_energy,
    COALESCE((SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM monthly_data), (SELECT ActiveEnergy FROM baseline)) AS last_monthly_energy;
`;
return msg;
